title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI Text Message Prequalification Agent.

faqItems.question: How does the iMessage (blue bubble) support work?
faqItems.answer: Our proprietary messaging gateway can detect if a recipient is an Apple user. When possible, it delivers the message via the iMessage protocol for a more native and trusted user experience. For all other users, it delivers a standard SMS seamlessly. The AI handles both formats without any change to your workflow.

faqItems.question: Is this compliant with TCPA regulations?
faqItems.answer: Yes. Compliance is at the core of our platform. We enforce consent protocols, automatically process opt-out requests (e.g., 'STOP'), manage quiet hours, and provide the tools you need to run your campaigns in a fully compliant manner.

faqItems.question: Can the AI understand complex replies?
faqItems.answer: Yes. It's powered by a natural language processing engine, not simple keywords. It can understand intent, such as positive interest, negative responses, questions, and requests to speak with a human, and will react according to the rules you set.
